name: convert
description: Universal converter for Time, Color, Units (length, weight, temp, digital, CSS, crypto, duration, speed, area, volume).

name: compare
description: Compares two values with unit conversions (e.g., 10km vs 5miles).

name: transform_string
description: Detects encoding (Base64/Hex/JSON) and returns decoded values plus transformations (upper, lower, hashes).

name: analyze_color
description: Parses colors (Hex, RGB, HSL, Oklch, etc.) and returns all format conversions plus accessibility analysis.

arguments.name: color_input
arguments.desc: Color in any format (#FF5733, rgb(255,87,51), oklch(0.68 0.21 33))

name: inspect_jwt
description: Decodes a JWT header and payload without verification.

name: generate_mock_data
description: Generates random mock data (uuid, hex, ipv4).

name: calculate_statistics
description: Returns statistics (mean, median, min, max, sum) for a list of numbers.
